languages.text: The owner of the ability runs forward, causing damage to everyone who gets in his way. Also causes a Toughness check on these targets; if they fail, the targets become Staggered.

traits.locale_text: The owner of the ability runs forward, causing damage to everyone who gets in his way. Also causes a Toughness check on these targets; if they fail, the targets become Staggered.

languages.text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Это существо мчится в выбранном направлении, расходуя все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, и наносит урон каждому существу на пути. Эти цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its movement points and dealing damage to each creature on its path. Those creatures must pass a Toughness resistance test with a −20 penalty or become staggered for 1 round.

This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Эти цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Это существо мчится в выбранном направлении, расходуя все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, и наносит урон каждому существу на пути. Эти цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

Это существо мчится в выбранном направлении, расходуя все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очки передвижения{/g}, и наносит урон каждому существу на пути. Эти цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −20 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлены{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur läuft in die gewählte Richtung, verbraucht dabei alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} und fügt allen Kreaturen auf ihrem Weg Schaden zu. Diese Kreaturen müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} mit einem Abzug von -20 bestehen, um nicht 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang mit "{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}" belegt zu werden.
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur läuft in die gewählte Richtung, verbraucht dabei alle ihre Bewegungspunkte und fügt allen Kreaturen auf ihrem Weg Schaden zu. Diese Kreaturen müssen eine Widerstandsprobe auf Zähigkeit mit einem Abzug von -20 bestehen, um nicht 1 Runde lang mit "Wanken" belegt zu werden.

languages.text: Cette créature s'élance dans la direction sélectionnée en dépensant tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} et en infligeant des dégâts à chaque créature sur sa trajectoire. Ces dernières doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} avec une pénalité de −20. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature s'élance dans la direction sélectionnée en dépensant tous ses points de déplacement et en infligeant des dégâts à chaque créature sur sa trajectoire. Ces dernières doivent réussir un test de résistance d'Endurance avec une pénalité de −20. En cas d'échec, elles subissent l'effet Sidération pendant 1 round.

languages.text: 此生物朝选定的方向猛冲，耗尽所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，对冲锋路径上的所有生物造成伤害。受影响的生物需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-20减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物朝选定的方向猛冲，耗尽所有移动点数，对冲锋路径上的所有生物造成伤害。受影响的生物需要进行坚韧抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-20减值，若未能通过检定，则会陷入恐慌状态，持续一轮。

languages.text: La criatura corre en la dirección adecuada, gastando todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} e infligiendo daño a cualquier criatura en su camino. Dichas criaturas deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} con una penalización de −20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibradas{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La criatura corre en la dirección adecuada, gastando todos sus puntos de movimiento e infligiendo daño a cualquier criatura en su camino. Dichas criaturas deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Resistencia con una penalización de −20 o quedar desequilibradas durante 1 asalto.

languages.text: この生物は選択された方向にダッシュし、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}をすべて消費して、その進路上にいるすべての生物にダメージを与える。これらの生物は-20のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態となる。
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物は選択された方向にダッシュし、移動ポイントをすべて消費して、その進路上にいるすべての生物にダメージを与える。これらの生物は-20のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。
この生物は選択された方向にダッシュし、移動ポイントをすべて消費して、その進路上にいるすべての生物にダメージを与える。これらの生物は-20のペナルティで耐久力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると1ラウンドの間よろけ状態となる。

languages.text: Bu yaratık, seçilen yöne doğru atılır ve tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanlarını{/g} harcarken yoluna çıkan her yaratığa hasar verir. Yoluna çıkan yaratıklar, −20 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallarlar{/g}. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: This creature dashes in the selected direction, spending all its {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} and dealing damage to each creature in its path. Those creatures must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 penalty or become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, seçilen yöne doğru atılır ve tüm hareket puanlarını harcarken yoluna çıkan her yaratığa hasar verir. Yoluna çıkan yaratıklar, −20 ceza puanına sahip bir Dayanıklılık direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde afallarlar. Etkisi 1 raunt sürer.

Bu yaratık, seçilen yöne doğru atılır ve tüm hareket puanlarını harcarken yoluna çıkan her yaratığa hasar verir. Yoluna çıkan yaratıklar, −20 ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde afallarlar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
